Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
meaning unknown; possibly: = musical term; or: = musical instrument; or: = melody; ≈ possibly associated with the winepress (גַּת) or with the town of Gath (גַּת)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Izhar (יִצְהָר) descendant of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► opponent of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) ancestor of Korahite (קָרְחִי) clan
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= state in which an inanimate object is regarded as worthy of love
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

Node.gloss: to desire|to long for|to be eager
Node.definition: = state/process by which humans, deities, or animals experience a strong desire to see an object or perform an event

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
literally: to be finished; hence: = process by which humans feel physically weak as a result of hardship or a deeply felt wish for something to happen

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= area enclosed by walls or buildings
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= the physical body of humans and animals, not including the mind and the inner person
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= small bird, speckled brown in color; found in abundance around towns and settlements; lives on grass and grain; ◄ Passer domesticus, Passer hispaniolensis, and Passer moabiticus; ► clean and can therefore be eaten
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= small bird with long slender wings and short legs; it flies at great speed for long periods on end, twisting and turning, usually in fairly large groups, catching insects in the air as they fly; it makes its nest under overhangs on rock faces, in caves, or in human structures, such as buildings and the underside of bridges; ◄ |iHirundo daurica|i*, |iHirundo obsolete|iDelichon urbica
= structure, made by birds ◄ from twigs, straw, grass, or other materials, ► to lay their eggs and shelter their young; ≈ associated with security
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
young of birds
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state of being considered fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of admiration
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= state of being considered fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of admiration
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
meaning unsure: = a kind of tree|= unknown location; ≈ the name may reflect the weeping (= dripping) of balsam trees
= an opening in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it; ≈ its water is regarded as a source of blessing
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= causative action by which someone puts an object on top of or in front of something else
= rain that falls from mid October until early November; ► moistens the soil and makes it soft to facilitate plowing and sowing; ≈ regarded as a blessing from YHWH
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear
Node.definition: = process by which humans, deities, or objects become perceptible, primarily though not necessarily exclusively to the eye
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness
= to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a (non eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= area enclosed by walls or buildings
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
to stand at the threshold (סַף) of a building; ► possibly serving as a guard or doorkeeper

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which someone resides in a certain place
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= state of being considered fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of admiration
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
